alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 05 at 2:53PM MST until November 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM MST MONDAY FOR FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 229 AND 230... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 6 PM MST Monday. A Fire Weather Watch has also been issued. This Fire Weather Watch for gusty winds and low relative humidity is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 229 and 230. * Winds...West 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. The strongest winds will likely occur on Tuesday. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
